scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,api "npm run dev -w apps/web" "npm run start:dev -w apps/api"
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/api && npm run test -w apps/web
scripts.test:unit:api: node scripts/run-with-env.cjs -- npm run test:cov -w apps/api
scripts.test:int:api: node scripts/run-with-env.cjs -- npm run test:e2e -w apps/api
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/api && npm run lint -w apps/web
